name: Rubber Royale: Holiday Prologue
description:
Happy holidays! Hold on to your beanies because the Rubber Royale Holiday Prologue is here - the only Xmas game that rewards you for being naughty instead of nice.



The game is free and will give you a small taste of the hilariously violent and chaotic gameplay Rubber Royale is all about before we release it fully next year.

Join us on a crazy holiday adventure where you race through a dangerous Christmas island, knock out your friends into the freezing water surrounding a cold, yet cheerful abandoned outpost, and grab the win in the freezing collapsing colosseum.



We can’t guarantee what’s going to be under your Christmas tree this year but we CAN promise you constant action and hilarious brawls that will make you cuss out your loved ones in this unhinged Holiday-fight extravaganza.
